rev.comment: another case of covert mining found
rev.diff:
Line 202: Line 202:
===Covert "mining"===
===Covert "mining"===
â
In June, 2011, [[Symantec]] warned about the possibility of [[botnet]]s engaging in covert "mining" of bitcoins (unauthorized use of resources of computers to generate bitcoins).<ref>http://www.symantec.com/connect/blogs/bitcoin-botnet-mining</ref> Later that month, an employee of [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] was caught after using the company's servers to generate bitcoins.<ref>http://thenextweb.com/au/2011/06/23/abc-employee-caught-mining-for-bitcoins-on-company-servers/</ref>
+
In June, 2011, [[Symantec]] warned about the possibility of [[botnet]]s engaging in covert "mining" of bitcoins (unauthorized use of resources of computers to generate bitcoins).<ref>http://www.symantec.com/connect/blogs/bitcoin-botnet-mining</ref> Later that month, an employee of [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation]] was caught after using the company's servers to generate bitcoins.<ref>http://thenextweb.com/au/2011/06/23/abc-employee-caught-mining-for-bitcoins-on-company-servers/</ref> There were also found cases of malware containing bitcoin miners.<ref>http://www.zdnet.com/blog/security/researchers-find-malware-rigged-with-bitcoin-miner/8934</ref>
==See also==
